title: It’s Time to Follow the Example of SRAM Athletes Racing Omloop Het Nieuwsblad
content:
We saw gravel technology from SRAM on display at this year’s Omloop Het Nieuwsblad. It’s time you consider similar for your own riding.

Read the full article at It’s Time to Follow the Example of SRAM Athletes Racing Omloop Het Nieuwsblad on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
